parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)
parameters.label: Subscription (for Sentinel workspace)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, selected = iff(id =~ '{DefaultWorkspace_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project resourceGroup

parameters.name: GiBperday
parameters.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated > startofday({TimeRange:start}) and TimeGenerated < startofday({TimeRange:end})
// Only look at chargeable Tables
| where _IsBillable == True
| summarize
TotalGBytes =round(sum(_BilledSize/(1024*1024*1024)),2)
by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)//, Solution=tt
| summarize round(avg(TotalGBytes),2)

parameters.name: Help
parameters.label: Show Help
parameters.description: This will show some help information to help you understand the page you are on

parameters.name: ServerList
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines" or type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| project id

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| extend state = trim(' ', tostring(properties.provisioningState))
		,sku   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.sku.name))
        ,skuUpdate = trim(' ', tostring(properties.sku.lastSkuUpdate))
		,retentionDays = trim(' ', tostring(properties.retentionInDays))
		,dailyquotaGB  = trim(' ', tostring(properties.workspaceCapping.dailyQuotaGb))
| extend dailyquotaGB = iif(dailyquotaGB !=-1.0, dailyquotaGB,"Not set")
| extend skuUpdate    = iif(strlen(skuUpdate) > 0, skuUpdate,"Unknown")
| extend sentinel     = iif(toint(retentionDays) < 90,"If you have Sentinel, you can change your retention to 90days (free)?","")
| project ['Workspace Name']=id, ['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, location, ['Data Retention(days)']=retentionDays, ['Last known SKU update']=skuUpdate, ['Daily Data Cap']=dailyquotaGB, ['License']=sku, ['Notes'] = sentinel

content.json:
This section shows the general status of data ingestion in the selected workspace.

Please select the *Subscription* and *Workspace* you wish to view, and the *TimeRange* to define the scope.

This workbook displays information about the health of different security agents installed on the servers (both Azure Virtual Machines and Azure Arc servers). The workbook combines data from the following sources:
* Server list (Azure Resource Graph)
* Sentinel log collection status (Sentinel Log Analytics workspace)
* Defender for Cloud status (Azure Resource Graph)
* Defender for Endpoint status (Sentinel Log Analytics workspace)
* Vulnerability assessment solution status (Azure Resource Graph)

**Note! Azure Databricks servers are excluded, as they are managed by Azure.**

You can filter the results based on status or server type, and export the results into Excel.

parameters.name: UnhealthyCriteria
parameters.label: Unhealthy definition
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"1m", "label":"1 minute without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"5m", "label":"5 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"30m", "label":"30 minutes without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1h", "label":"1 hour without heartbeat", "selected":true },
    { "value":"2h", "label":"2 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"8h", "label":"8 hours without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"1d", "label":"1 day without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"2d", "label":"2 days without heartbeat", "selected":false },
    { "value":"7d", "label":"7 days without heartbeat", "selected":false }
]

parameters.name: HideBackgroundData
parameters.label: Hide unnecessary tables
parameters.description: Select 'Yes' to hide tables that contain background data

content.json: The latency is measured by comparing the result of the **ingestion_time()** function to the value of the **TimeGenerated** property.

content.title: {TimeRange:label}: Server health status in Sentinel (unhealthy definition: {UnhealthyCriteria:label})

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| extend Agent = case(
    Version startswith "0.", "Azure Monitoring Agent",
    Version startswith "1.", "Azure Monitoring Agent",
    Version startswith "10.", "Log Analytics Agent",
    "Unknown"
)
| summarize AggrAgent = strcat_array(make_set(Agent),",") by Computer
| extend AgentVersion = case(
    AggrAgent == "Azure Monitoring Agent", "Azure Monitoring Agent", 
    AggrAgent == "Log Analytics Agent", "Log Analytics Agent",
    "Both"
)
| summarize count() by AgentVersion
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: Agent versions (covers only servers connected to Sentinel).

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend ServerName = tolower(Computer)
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend ServerName = tolower(Computer)
| join kind=leftouter (
DeviceInfo
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| summarize LastMDEReport = max(TimeGenerated) by DeviceName
| project ServerName = tolower(DeviceName), LastMDEReport
) on ServerName
| where "{StatusSentinel:label}" == "All" or State in ({StatusSentinel})
| extend MDEState = case(
    isnull(LastMDEReport), "Not connected",
    LastMDEReport < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), "Unhealthy",
    "Healthy"
)
| summarize count() by MDEState
| project MDEState, count_
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: Server status in Defender for Endpoint (unhealthy definition: {UnhealthyCriteria:label}). Note! Covers only servers connected to Sentinel.

items.name: Server status in Defender for Endpoint (only servers connected to Sentinel)

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines" or type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| where "{ServerSubscription:label}" == "All" or strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId) in ({ServerSubscription})
| extend details = todynamic(properties)
| extend publisher = tostring(details.storageProfile.imageReference.publisher)
| where publisher != "AzureDatabricks"
| summarize count() by type
| extend ServerType = iff(type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", "Azure", "ARC")
| project ServerType, count_
content.title: Total number of servers

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| extend Agent = case(
    Version startswith "0.", strcat("AMA (",Version,")"),
    Version startswith "1.", strcat("AMA (",Version,")"),
    Version startswith "10.", strcat("LA (",Version,")"),
    "Unknown"
)
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated), AgentVersion = strcat_array(make_set(Agent),",") by Computer
| extend State = iff(LastHeartbeat < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), 'Unhealthy', 'Healthy')
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - LastHeartbeat
| extend ServerName = tolower(Computer)
| extend ["TimeAgo"] = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago')
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| extend Packed = pack_all()
| extend ServerName = tolower(Computer)
) on ServerName
| where TimeGenerated == LastHeartbeat
| join (
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| make-series InternalTrend=iff(count() > 0, 1, 0) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {UnhealthyCriteria} by Computer
| extend Trend=array_slice(InternalTrend, array_length(InternalTrend) - 30, array_length(InternalTrend)-1)
| extend (s_min, s_minId, s_max, s_maxId, s_avg, s_var, s_stdev) = series_stats(Trend)
| extend ServerName = tolower(Computer)
| project ServerName, Trend, s_avg
) on ServerName
| join kind=leftouter (
DeviceInfo
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| summarize LastMDEReport = max(TimeGenerated) by DeviceName
| project ServerName=tolower(DeviceName), LastMDEReport
) on ServerName
| join kind=leftouter ( 
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| summarize LastSecurityEvent = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| project ServerName = tolower(Computer), LastSecurityEvent
) on ServerName
| where "{StatusSentinel:label}" == "All" or State in ({StatusSentinel})
| extend MDEStatus = case(
    isnull(LastMDEReport), "Not reporting",
    LastMDEReport < ago({UnhealthyCriteria}), "Unhealthy",
    "Healthy"
)
| extend SecurityEventStatus = case(
        isnull(LastSecurityEvent), "Not reporting",
        LastSecurityEvent < ago(2h), "Unhealthy",
        "Healthy"
    )
| order by State, s_avg asc, TimeAgo
| project ["_ComputerName_"] = ServerName, ["Server name"]=strcat('ðŸ–¥ï¸ ', ServerName), ["Environment"] = iff(ComputerEnvironment == "Azure", ComputerEnvironment, Category), ["OS"]=iff(isempty(OSName), OSType, OSName), ["Azure Resource"]=_ResourceId, State, ["Time"]=strcat('ðŸ•’ ', TimeAgo), ["Agent version"]=AgentVersion, ["Heartbeat Trend"]=Trend, ["Details"]=Packed, ["Security event status"]=SecurityEventStatus, ["MDE health status"]=MDEStatus, ["Last security event"]=LastSecurityEvent, ["Last MDE report"]=LastMDEReport
content.title: {TimeRange:label}: all agent heartbeat data

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines" or type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| where "{ServerSubscription:label}" == "All" or strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId) in ({ServerSubscription})
| extend details = todynamic(properties)
| extend publisher = tostring(details.storageProfile.imageReference.publisher)
| where publisher != "AzureDatabricks"
| extend osType = case(
type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines", strcat(toupper(substring(properties.osName,0,1)),substring(properties.osName,1,strlen(properties.osName)-1)),
type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, 
"Unknown"
)
| extend serverState = case(
type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines", properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus, ""
)
| extend resourceId = tolower(id)
| project name, resourceId , type, location, osType, serverState
| join kind=leftouter(securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend assessmentStatusCode = tostring(properties.status.code)
| extend source = tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Source)
| extend resourceId = tolower(tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id))
| extend resourceName = extract(@"(.+)/(.+)", 2, resourceId)
| extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/([^/]+)(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/[^/]+$", resourceId)
| extend RegexResourceType = regexResourceId[0]
| extend mainType = RegexResourceType[1], extendedType = RegexResourceType[2], resourceType = RegexResourceType[3]
| extend providerName = RegexResourceType[0],
                        mainType = case(mainType !~ "", strcat("/",mainType), ""),
                        extendedType = case(extendedType!~ "", strcat("/",extendedType), ""),
                        resourceType = case(resourceType!~ "", strcat("/",resourceType), "")
| extend array = split(resourceId, '/')
| extend typeFullPath = case(array_length(array) == 3,  'subscription', strcat(providerName, mainType, extendedType, resourceType))
| extend typeFullPath = case(array_length(array) == 5, 'resourcegroups', typeFullPath)
| where typeFullPath in ('microsoft.compute/virtualmachines', 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| extend assessmentKey = tostring(name)
| where assessmentKey in~ ("d1db3318-01ff-16de-29eb-28b344515626", 
                            "45cfe080-ceb1-a91e-9743-71551ed24e94", 
                            "720a3e77-0b9a-4fa9-98b6-ddf0fd7e32c1", 
                            "27ac71b1-75c5-41c2-adc2-858f5db45b08", 
                            "8e2b96ff-3de2-289b-b5c1-3b9921a3441e",
                            "ffff0522-1e88-47fc-8382-2a80ba848f5d")
| extend osTypeProperty = properties.additionalData["OS Type"]
| extend osType = case(isnotempty(osTypeProperty), osTypeProperty, "")
| extend hasAgent = case(assessmentKey == "d1db3318-01ff-16de-29eb-28b344515626" 
                            or assessmentKey == "45cfe080-ceb1-a91e-9743-71551ed24e94" 
                            or assessmentKey == "720a3e77-0b9a-4fa9-98b6-ddf0fd7e32c1" 
                            or assessmentKey == "27ac71b1-75c5-41c2-adc2-858f5db45b08", assessmentStatusCode, "")
| extend hasHealthyAgent = case(assessmentKey == "8e2b96ff-3de2-289b-b5c1-3b9921a3441e" , assessmentStatusCode, "")
| extend agentIssues = case(hasHealthyAgent =~ "Unhealthy", properties.status.description, "")
| extend vulnerabilityAssessmentStatus = case(assessmentKey == "ffff0522-1e88-47fc-8382-2a80ba848f5d", assessmentStatusCode, "")
| extend vulnerabilityAssessmentStatusDescription = case(assessmentKey == "ffff0522-1e88-47fc-8382-2a80ba848f5d", properties.status.description, "")
| extend workspaceAzureResourceId = case(hasAgent !~ "", properties.additionalData["Reporting workspace azure id"], "")
| extend workspaceName = case(workspaceAzureResourceId !~ "", extract(@"(.+)/(.+)", 2, workspaceAzureResourceId), "")
| extend assessmentDisplayName = case(isnotempty(properties.displayName), properties.displayName, properties.metadata.displayName)
| summarize assessmentsCount = count() , hasAgent = max(hasAgent), hasHealthyAgent=max(hasHealthyAgent), agentIssues= max(agentIssues), vulnerabilityAssessmentStatus=max(vulnerabilityAssessmentStatus), vulnerabilityAssessmentDescription=max(vulnerabilityAssessmentStatus), workspaceName = max(workspaceName) by resourceId
| extend agentMonitoring = case(hasAgent =~ "NotApplicable", 'Not applicable',
												hasAgent =~ "", '',
                                                hasAgent =~ "Unhealthy", "Not monitored",
                                                hasAgent =~ "Healthy" and isnotempty(hasHealthyAgent) and hasHealthyAgent !~ "Healthy", "Partially monitored",
                                                "Monitored")) on resourceId
| where "{StatusSecurityCenter:label}" == "All" or agentMonitoring in ({StatusSecurityCenter})
| where "{ServerType:label}" == "All" or type in ({ServerType})
| project name, resourceId, type, osType, hasAgent, hasHealthyAgent, agentMonitoring, agentIssues, vulnerabilityAssessmentStatus, vulnerabilityAssessmentDescription, serverState
content.title: Server list and Security Center status (from Resource Graph)

content.json:
## Server agent status
The status information is fetched from the following locations:
* **Heartbeat status (Sentinel)** - Uses the Heartbeat table 
* **Security event status (Sentinel)** - Uses the SecurityEvent table 
* **Status (Defender for Cloud)** - Uses the Microsoft Defender for Cloud assessments
* **Status (Vulnerability Assessment)** - Uses the Microsoft Defender for Cloud assessments
* **Status (Defender for Endpoint)** - Uses the DeviceInfo table (which is forwarded from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint)
* **Agent version** - Uses the SecurityEvent table
* **Heartbeat history (Sentinel)** - Uses the Heartbeat table
* **Power state** - Uses Resource Graph

**Note! Azure Databricks servers are excluded, as they are managed by Azure.**
